content:
Diagnosis:		Clear cell renal cell carcinoma

Management:		Right partial nephrectomy 15 Jan 2024

Histology:		pT1a (2.1cm) clear cell renal cell carcinoma, Fuhrman grade 2, margins clear, BAP1 positive

Current situation:	Routine surveillance review

[redacted name] attended for routine follow-up today following partial nephrectomy. She has made an excellent recovery from surgery with no ongoing symptoms. Her wound has healed well and she has returned to normal activities. Blood pressure is well controlled at 132/78mmHg. Renal function remains stable with creatinine 92 umol/L. Recent CT chest/abdomen/pelvis on 15/4/24 shows no evidence of recurrence or metastatic disease, and the post-surgical changes in the right kidney are as expected. The plan is to continue surveillance as per protocol with next imaging in 6 months. She will be reviewed in clinic following those results. She understands to contact us sooner if she develops any new concerning symptoms.

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: clear cell renal cell carcinoma, Fuhrman grade 2, margins clear

cancer_timeline.value: CT chest/abdomen/pelvis shows no evidence of recurrence or metastatic disease, post-surgical changes as expected

status_updates.value: Early stage renal cell carcinoma treated with partial nephrectomy. Excellent post-surgical recovery with no evidence of recurrence on surveillance imaging
Review in clinic following next imaging results
